meta.name: No Nitro Upsell
meta.tagline: Removes ALL of Discord's nitro upsells by tricking the client into thinking you have nitro.
meta.description:
**This patch is pretty invasive, may cause errors. Beware!**

Ported from [this Equicord Plugin](https://github.com/Equicord/Equicord/blob/main/src/equicordplugins/noNitroUpsell/index.ts).
meta.changelog: Added a handful of patches to not override nitro for specific features that cause issues.
